languages.text: "Боюсь, после вашего празднества у Вольного Торговца многократно вырастут затраты на ремонт судна".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, после вашего празднества у Вольного Торговца многократно вырастут затраты на ремонт судна".

languages.text: "I fear that your celebration would have substantially increased the repair costs for the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「あなたの祝宴のために、ローグトレーダーの修理費用がかなりかさんでしまうのではないかと心配です」
languages.original_text: "I fear that your celebration would have substantially increased the repair costs for the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの祝宴のために、ローグトレーダーの修理費用がかなりかさんでしまうのではないかと心配です」

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Eure Feier hätte die Reparatuarkosten für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} deutlich in die Höhe getrieben."
languages.original_text: "I fear that your celebration would have substantially increased the repair costs for the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Eure Feier hätte die Reparatuarkosten für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} deutlich in die Höhe getrieben."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, votre célébration aurait considérablement augmenté les frais de réparations à la charge {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "I fear that your celebration would have substantially increased the repair costs for the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, votre célébration aurait considérablement augmenté les frais de réparations à la charge {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: «Temo que su festejo habría incrementado drásticamente los costes de reparación para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I fear that your celebration would have substantially increased the repair costs for the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Temo que su festejo habría incrementado drásticamente los costes de reparación para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: “我担心，你的庆祝活动可能会大大提高行商浪人承受的维修费用。”
languages.original_text: "I fear that your celebration would have substantially increased the repair costs for the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “我担心，你的庆祝活动可能会大大提高行商浪人承受的维修费用。”

languages.text: "Zaferi kutlamak, Hür Tacir'e fazladan tamirat masrafı olmaktan başka işe yaramazdı."
